title: Education Day with Giovanni Giuntoli
desc: Want a day of quick, in depth, inspiration and education? Tearsheet is known for our educational experiences? and our creative collaborating. Spend a day with our industry's best editorial/educators learning techniques and trends ranging from  Red Carpet  to  Avant Garde  styling. Get your hands into hair extensions, styling forms, and other creative tools all while learning how these can tools can make you more money in the salon! Giovanni Giuntoli  and the Tearsheet editorial educators will take you through a full day of education. Tearsheet will provide breakfast and lunch as well so the networking can continue throughout the day in studio. Professional styling product will also be provided along with mannequin heads and creative tools. We will also have tools for demonstration and purchase. You only need to being your tools and creative open mind!
